docs.snippet: The Look-Up Line would warn players they are near the boards, where severe head and neck injuries frequently occur....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Look-Up Line would warn players they are near the boards, where severe head and neck injuries frequently occur.
docs.abstract: USA Hockey's board of directors will vote on proposal to adopt the Look-Up Line, visual warning track that will alert players when they are near boards where severe head and neck injuries frequently occur; amateur hockey players have continued to sustain paralyzing injuries at boards despite series of rule changes and awareness campaigns in the past.

headline.main: Look-Up Line Would Warn Danger’s Ahead for Amateur Hockey Players
